# [Interview #128: WH Signing Report - Br00se, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=128#2)

#### Robert Jordan

Someone asked if a hero of the Wheel that had already been spun out could still be seen in
*Tel'aran'rhiod*
. He said point blank "No". I'm hoping the person who posed that question will also post about it, in case I got something wrong.
